name: Escape From Jellham-8
description:
Save the Jellyhams! Run and gun with your gooey friends in this silly metroidvania.

Controls:
WASD / Left Stick            Movement
Mouse / Right Stick         Aim
Space / L1 / A                  Jump
Left Mouse / R1 / Y         Fire
Shift / L2 / B                     Dash
Right Mouse / R2 / X      Grapple

(WARNING: Gamepad controls are a bit wonky sometimes, aiming can pick up mouse movement)
